hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.content: Full-stack developer specialized in MERN Stack with +15 deployed projects. I transform ideas into scalable web applications using React, Node.js and modern databases.

about.title: About me
about.intro: Full-Stack developer specialized in creating scalable and efficient web solutions.
about.journey: Self-taught passionate developer who transformed curiosity into solid technical expertise.
about.passion: I convert complex ideas into intuitive interfaces and robust backends.
about.goal: Focused on delivering clean code, optimized performance and exceptional experiences.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A selection of my most relevant work

library.title: Digital Library System
library.description: Full-stack app with authentication, profile management and review system. MERN Stack + JWT authentication.

todo.title: Advanced Task Manager
todo.description: Task application with dual authentication (MongoDB + PostgreSQL). Advanced hooks and optimized global state.

food.title: Online Ordering System
food.description: E-commerce platform for food orders with smart cart and inventory management.

rickandmorty.title: Rick & Morty Explorer
rickandmorty.description: Interactive interface to explore characters using REST API. Dynamic search and filters.

calculator.title: Scientific Calculator
calculator.description: Responsive calculator with advanced operations. UI/UX optimized for all devices.

treemap.title: Interactive TreeMap Visualization
treemap.description: Dynamic data dashboard with D3.js. Hierarchical visualization with tooltips and fluid animations.

choropleth.title: Dynamic Choropleth Map
choropleth.description: Interactive geographical visualization with D3.js. Regional data analysis with color gradients.

todo.title: Vanilla JS Todo App
todo.description: Responsive task app with LocalStorage. No frameworks, pure code optimized for performance.

music.title: Web Music Player
music.description: Complete player with advanced controls. Dynamic playlist and intuitive interface in pure JS.

PlataformerGame.title: 2D Platform Game
PlataformerGame.description: Game engine from scratch with custom physics. Collision mechanics and fluid animations.

RolePlayingGame.title: Interactive RPG
RolePlayingGame.description: Turn-based combat system and inventory management. Complex game logic in JavaScript.

items.description:
• Development of complete MERN Stack applications
• Implementation of RESTful APIs and relational/NoSQL databases
• Production deployment with Docker and agile methodologies

• Mastery of Microsoft Office 365 and Google Workspace tools
• Data visualization with Power BI and design tools
• Optimization of enterprise digital workflows

• Built +10 deployed full-stack projects
• Specialization in data visualization with D3.js
• Development of microservices and database systems
